There are many excellent museums around the world that have a strong focus on photography. Here are a few notable ones:

1. **Museum of Modern Art (MoMA)**, New York City: MoMA has an impressive photography collection and regularly hosts exhibitions on various aspects of photography.
2. **International Center of Photography (ICP)**, New York City: As its name suggests, ICP is dedicated to the art of photography and hosts a wide range of exhibitions, from contemporary to historical photography.
3. **National Gallery of Art**, Washington, D.C.: The National Gallery has a strong photography collection and regularly hosts exhibitions on photography, including works by masters like Ansel Adams and Dorothea Lange.
4. **Getty Museum**, Los Angeles: The Getty Museum has an extensive photography collection and hosts exhibitions on photography, including works by famous photographers like Irving Penn and Richard Avedon.
5. **Victoria and Albert Museum (V&A)**, London: The V&A has a large photography collection and hosts exhibitions on photography, including fashion, documentary, and art photography.
6. **Musée d'Orsay**, Paris: While not exclusively a photography museum, the Musée d'Orsay has an impressive collection of 19th- and early 20th-century photography.
7. **Deichtorhallen**, Hamburg: This museum is one of the largest and most important photography museums in Europe, hosting exhibitions on contemporary and historical photography.
8. **Fotomuseum Winterthur**, Winterthur, Switzerland: This museum is dedicated to the art of photography and hosts exhibitions on various aspects of photography, from documentary to art photography.
9. **Canadian Photography Institute**, Ottawa: This museum is dedicated to the art of photography in Canada and hosts exhibitions on Canadian and international photography.
10. **National Media Museum**, Bradford, UK: This museum has a strong collection of photography and hosts exhibitions on photography, including works by famous photographers like Don McCullin.

These are just a few examples, and there are many more museums around the world that have a strong focus on photography. I recommend checking their websites or social media to see what exhibitions are coming up during your planned visits.

Do you have a specific type of photography or era that interests you? I can try to provide more tailored recommendations!
